module.name: module.description
Lengow: Export your catalog and synchronize your stock

module.name: global_setting.screen.preprod_mode_description
Lengow: Use pre-production mode for testing and to simulate fictitious orders. Please note that you have to activate this setting on your pre-production server ONLY

module.name: global_setting.screen.log_file_description
Lengow: Find all the maintenance logs below (imported orders, errors reports...). They will be recorded here for 20 days.

module.name: lengow_settings.lengow_selection_enabled_legend
Lengow: Activate this option if you do not want to export all available products. Then, select only the products you want to export

module.name: lengow_settings.lengow_import_days_legend
Lengow: Activate this option if you have incorrect pending orders. It lets you re-import all orders that have been processed during this faulty period

module.name: lengow_settings.lengow_import_stock_ship_mp_title
Lengow: I want to decrease my stock

module.name: lengow_settings.lengow_import_stock_ship_mp_legend
Lengow: Use this option to take marketplaces orders into account for your PrestaShop backoffice
